query: (Background: glioma^4 OR "Astrocytomas" OR "Ependymomas" OR "Oligodendrogliomas" OR Doc_title: glioma^4 OR "Astrocytomas" OR "Ependymomas" OR "Oligodendrogliomas") AND (Background: BRAF^4 OR NS7 OR B-raf OR BRAF1 OR RAFB1 OR B-RAF1 OR Doc_title: BRAF^4 OR NS7 OR B-raf OR BRAF1 OR RAFB1 OR B-RAF1)
